Posts.Content: jerseytomato wrote: I am in the process of making a decision regarding rads and am leaning towards 3d CRT for accelerated partial breast irradiation (APBI). I would love to hear from people who have used this technique, and am particularly interested to find out what the short term side effects were (if any), and any late onset complications you might have experienced. Dx 1/21/2011, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 3D CRT jerseytomato jerseytomato
